categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Geris Paelid was a male Human of the Sith Empire living during the Cold War. As a member of Imperial Intelligence's Experimental Weapons Division he was dispatched to Tatooine with a mission to test an experimental weapon on unsuspecting locals. He was however unsuccessful in tricking anyone and was eventually forced to ask a fellow Imperial for help with combat testing the prototype.
